text:
I am trying to do the following with publications:

default -> edchanges -> pinstripe -> beulah

Where I created all but default from the New Publication option from the web
interface. This is what I got in the publication.xconf file.

<template id="edchanges"/><template id="pinstripe"/>

It would appear that two is the maximum number it will put in. The templating
code grabs the first one. I was able to replicate on zones. Create reftest based
on default, reftest2 based on reftest. Going to reftest2 shows template used as
default. 

I know this used to work properly in the past.
creator: rfrovarp@apache.org

text:
sorry, i think i introduced that one. must have overlooked that the old template
setting is copied over... thanks for spotting and fixing.
creator: nettings@apache.org
